mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", stock_id AS "stockId", loca_number AS "locaNumber", turnover_id AS "turnoverId", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet2_check_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_check_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

SELECT wms_cabinet2_check_task.id AS "id", wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_number AS "taskNumber", wms_cabinet2_check_task.stock_id AS "stockId", wms_cabinet2_check_task.loca_number AS "locaNumber", wms_cabinet2_check_task.turnover_id AS "turnoverId", wms_cabinet2_stock.material_sku as "materialSku", wms_cabinet2_stock.material_name as "materialName", wms_cabinet2_check_task.operator AS "operator", wms_cabinet2_check_task.operation_time AS "operationTime", wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_state AS "taskState", wms_cabinet2_check_task.create_time AS "createTime", wms_cabinet2_check_task.update_time AS "updateTime", wms_cabinet2_turnover.barcode AS "barcode", wms_user.user_name as "userName", wms_user.serial_number as "serialNumber" FROM wms_cabinet2_check_task LEFT JOIN wms_cabinet2_turnover on wms_cabinet2_check_task.turnover_id=wms_cabinet2_turnover.id LEFT JOIN wms_user on wms_user.id=wms_cabinet2_check_task.operator LEFT JOIN wms_cabinet2_stock on wms_cabinet2_check_task.stock_id=wms_cabinet2_stock.id where 1 = 1 and wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_state in (0,1,2,3)
and wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and wms_user.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and wms_user.serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_stock.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_check_task.loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_check_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
mapper.update: update wms_cabinet2_check_task set task_state = #{state} where id = #{runningId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from wms_cabinet2_check_task where task_number = #{taskNumber} and task_state in('0','1','2','3')
mapper.update: update wms_cabinet2_check_task set task_state = #{state} where task_number = #{taskNumber}
mapper.select: DELETE from wms_cabinet2_check_task WHERE wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_state!=5 AND wms_cabinet2_check_task.task_state!=4
